These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow travels to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow travels to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all travels, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all travels, even private ones.

column1: Do you want to let members edit travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members edit travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to edit their travels.
column2: No, do not allow members to edit their travels.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own travels.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own travels.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all travels.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all travels.

column1: Do you want to let members delete travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their travels.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their travels.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own travels.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own travels.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all travels.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all travels.

column1: No, do not allow travels to be created.
column2: No, do not allow travels to be created.

column1: Do you want to let members upload photos to a travel listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.
column2: Do you want to let members upload photos to a travel listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.

column1: Yes, allow photo uploading to travels.
column2: Yes, allow photo uploading to travels.

column1: No, do not allow photo uploading.
column2: No, do not allow photo uploading.

column1: If you want to allow specific HTML tags, you can enter them below (separated by commas). Example: b, img, a, embed, font
column2: If you want to allow specific HTML tags, you can enter them below (separated by commas). Example: b, img, a, embed, font

column1: strong, b, em, i, u, strike, sub, sup, p, div, pre, address, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, span, ol, li, ul, a, img, embed, br, hr
column2: strong, b, em, i, u, strike, sub, sup, p, div, pre, address, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, span, ol, li, ul, a, img, embed, br, hr

Your members will be asked to provide some information about their travel listing when creating a new travel. Create some travel questions that allow them to describe their product in a way that relates to the theme of your community. To reorder the travel questions, click on their names and drag them up or down.

Do you want to let members create travels? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view travels, but only want certain levels to be able to create travels.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their travel listings. These options appear on your members' "Add Listings" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their listings. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.

column1: Enter the maximum number of allowed travels. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.
column2: Enter the maximum number of allowed travels. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view travels unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view travels unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view travels.
column2: No, the public cannot view travels.
